revised_title: In Memoriam: Celebrating the Lives and Contributions of Fallen Scientists
tldr: The president of the Royal Society, Sir Archibald Geikie, commemorates the lives and achievements of notable scientists who passed away, including Jean B. Edouard Bornet, Eduard Strasburger, Ferdinand Zirkel, Jules Henri Poincaré, and Sir Joseph Dalton Hooker. The address highlights their significant contributions to various fields of science and their impact on the scientific community.
